Mahmoud Meshrif Hussein  
Software  Test  Engineer  
 
Phone  Number:  )+20                                               LinkedIn  
Address:  6th Of October , Giza,  Egypt  )Ready to Relocate (                 GitHub  
Email  :                                HackerRank                  
 
 
Career  Objectives  
As a Software Engineer with rich college experience, I am passionate about exploring diverse fields. I 
have honed my testing skills and adapted to different technologies through various projects . Eager to 
learn and contribute to innovative solutions, alway s seeking opportunities to evolve and grow 
alongside technological advancements . 
 
Education  
Bachelor’s  Degree|  Faculty  of Computers and Information Sciences  
Ain Shams  University  
 Department: Bioinformatics  
 Graduation  Year:  2019
 Graduation  Project : Swarm intelligence for selection of biomolecules 
 Grade  of graduation  Project: (Excellent,  Grade is  95) "A+"
 
Internship s 
Software  Test  Trainee  | Information  Technology Institution  (ITI) [ Jul 2023  – Oct 2023 ] 
 Department : Software  Testing  and Quality  Assurance  Track  (4 months  intensive  code camp) 
 Ministry  of Communication  and Information  Technology  (MCIT)
o Develop  and execute  manual  test cases  based  on requirements  and Identify  report  bugs  and issues . 
o Develop  and maintain  automated  test scripts  using  tools  like Selenium , Cucumber , and Maven . 
o Develop  and execute  SQL queries  to retrieve  and manipulate  data for testing  purposes.  
o Responsible  for managing  and maintaining  Linux -based systems  and servers.  
 
Experience  
Quality Control Engineer  | UTrust for software testing service  [Jan 2023  – May  2023 ] 
o Working  as a Manual  Tester  on Practical  Projects.  
o Collaborate with the development team to understand the application's requirements, design test cases, 
execute test scenarios, report,  and track defects, and verify bug fixes.  
Senior Social Media Specialist | Epic Media House  [ Aug 2021 – Nov 2022] 
o Set up and optimize account pages within each platform to increase the visibility of the social content.  
o Execute social media strategies by managing posts, reels, stories, and platform  determination.  
o Collaborate with creative teams to identify social media content and get insights and information flow.  
 
 Projects  
 DemoNopCommerce  Automated scripts to test the GUI using Selenium WebDriver in Java, Maven, 
TestNG,  and Cucumber . 
 Guru99  Banking  (manual):  Review  SRS document,  Test -case  writing,  and bug report.  
 E-commerce  (HTML & CSS).  
 Certificates  & Courses  
ISTQB®  - International  Software  Testing  Qualifications  Board  
 ISTQB  - Foundation  Level,  Certificate  code : 231030041  
ITI platform  (Mahara Tech ) 
 Introduction  to SW  Testing  
 ISTQB  Foundation  Level  
 Effective  Test  Case  and Bug report  writing  
 Database  Fundamentals  
TEST  AUTOMATION  UNIVERSITY  
 Setting  a Foundation  for Successful  Test  Automation  
 IntelliJ  for Test  Automation  Engineers  
 Java  Programming  
 Web  Element  Locator  Strategies  
 TestNG 
 Cucumber  
  Udemy  
 Software Testing Bootcamp  
  QA Cart  
 Manual Testing  
 API Using  Postman  
 Selenium WebDriver  
 SQL Course  
Tools  and  Frameworks  
         •  Jira                                    • Trello  
           • Postman                           • Rest  Assured  
           • Selenium                          • TestNG  
           • Page object Model         • Cucumber  
           • Linux OS                             • Git & GitHub  
           • Jenkin                                 • Microsoft SQL Server       
           • Google sheet                     • Microsoft  Office  
Technical  Skills  
 Understand  and analyze  software  requirements  and identify  any missing  information  to perform  
Validation/testing  activities.  
 Design  Test  Cases  and Tracking  Bugs and  Write  Bugs  Report.  
 Report  findings (SW  Bugs)  on the defects  management tool.  
 Understanding test methods such as UI, integration, load, usability, compatibility Confirmation, smoke,  
and sanity  testing.  
 Strong  knowledge of  software  QA methodologies  tools  and processes.  
     Strong  problem -solving  and debugging  skills.  
 Familiar  with working  in an Agile  / Scrum  development  process.  
 Solid  understanding  of the software development  lifecycle.  
 API testing  using  Postman.  
 Automation  Testing  Preferred  Java  with  selenium.  
 Web  Technologies:  (HTML5,  CSS3)  
 programming  languages:  (Java,  C++)  with  OOP  
 Good  knowledge  of writing  queries  using  MySQL  or SQ L server.  
Language  
   • Arabic: (Native)            • English: (Excellent)          • German:  (Good)
